skills.title: Management - Organizational
skills.description: Risk Management, Resource Management, Leadership, Public Speaking, Public Speaking, Time Management

portfolio.title: Online Book Store
portfolio.description: BookStoreApp is a next-generation digital bookstore designed to provide a comprehensive and personalized book shopping experience. As an all-in-one platform for discovering, reviewing, and saving books, it combines user-generated insights with cutting-edge technology to create an engaging and intuitive book-buying journey.

portfolio.title: Task Manager
portfolio.description: A task manager writes, organizes, and rearranges tasks more efficiently. This task manager will allow the user to add a task, mark the task as complete, and delete the task.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: This is my Portfolio that I created using React Js .It shows all My Projects and the skills I have .The elegance of React.js brings dynamism to every section, ensuring fluid navigation through projects, skills, and a seamless contact form  this also contains a direct contact section.

testimonial.description: Was responsible for organizing and hosting all sessions for GDSC
I have taken a leading role in this club, from writing reports on college events to crafting anchoring scripts.
Organized numerous camping trips and green events.
